Text.Name: Build_Discipline
Text.Desc: The Discipline Temple is where disciples receive initiations and hold Abstinence Ceremonies. Commoners can also watch them. Unlocks Discipline policies. Handle social unrests by displaying punishments.

Text.Name: Build_Secret
Text.Desc: The Secret Pavilion is located above a room corner, usually inaccessible for commoners. Unlocks Plotting policies. Destabilize the society or the other agencies through schemes.

Text.Name: Build_Sermon
Text.Desc: There are statues sculpted in the Divine Temple. People can worship the statues and go preaching your religion. Preaching methods unlocked. Influence the world with the appeal of our sect.

Text.Name: Build_Recuit
Text.Desc: The Spirit Master Hall is used for admittance rites. The right people can join our sect here. Recruit skills unlocked. Used to recruit more talents.
